content: "La Traviata" - Libretto Overview (Condensed to 650 Characters)Act 1: At a Parisian party, the courtesan Violetta Valéry meets Alfredo Germont, who declares his love for her. Though hesitant, Violetta begins to fall for him.Act 2: Violetta and Alfredo live happily in the countryside until Alfredo’s father, Giorgio Germont, demands she leave Alfredo to protect their family’s honor. Heartbroken, Violetta agrees and writes Alfredo a farewell letter, returning to her former life.Act 3: Violetta, gravely ill, reunites with Alfredo after Giorgio confesses the truth. They pledge their love, but Violetta succumbs to illness and dies in Alfredo’s arms.
